actions.text: On agreeing to the Volkmer amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 253 (Roll no. 172).

description: Amendment sought to exclude from the moratorium any rulemaking actions by the Department of Agriculture pursuant to the Sheep Promotion, Research and Information Act of 1994.
purpose: An amendment (Printed as #34 in the Congressional Record of Feb. 22, 1994) to exclude from the moratorium any rulemaking actions by the Agriculture Dept. pursuant to the Sheep Promotion, Research and Information Act of 1994
